onboarding.welcome: Welcome to the app Little Indo Town

onboarding.location_promo: Get promos at Little Indo Town by allowing us to access your location
onboarding.notification: Always update promotions Little Indo Town

home.login_to_be_member: Log in and become a member to order

auth.info: Become a member to order and pay in the app, receive great offers, and collect points for your purchases.

register.password_rules:
Include one number
Include upper and lower case characters
Password must be at least 8 characters
register.check_email_info:
We have sent an email to albert@gmail.com
with a 6 digit code. this takes some time 
minutes to receive. Please enter the code below
here or tap the link in the email
